hero.name: Taha TOUFIK
hero.title: Software Development Engineer
hero.professional_message: Creator of modern and intuitive web experiences, I am a passionate developer with expertise in complete web solutions. I design high-performance digital solutions that combine elegant design and quality code, transforming your ideas into intuitive applications to bring your most ambitious projects to life with measurable results.

projects.title: My
projects.subtitle: A selection of my recent work

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: Complete e-commerce platform with integrated payment, inventory management and admin dashboard.
ecommerce.longDescription: Modern e-commerce application developed with Next.js and Node.js. Stripe payment integration, real-time inventory management system, and comprehensive admin interface with analytics.

mobile_finance.title: Finance Mobile App
mobile_finance.description: Personal finance management mobile app with cloud sync and analytics.
mobile_finance.longDescription: React Native application to track expenses, create budgets and visualize finances with interactive charts. Multi-device synchronization via Firebase.

dashboard.title: SaaS Analytics Dashboard
dashboard.description: Real-time data visualization interface with interactive charts and custom reports.
dashboard.longDescription: Modern dashboard to visualize and analyze real-time data. Interactive charts, advanced filters, PDF report export, and complete interface customization.

api_restful.title: RESTful API Microservices
api_restful.description: Microservices architecture with RESTful API, JWT authentication and Swagger documentation.
api_restful.longDescription: Scalable backend based on microservices architecture. JWT authentication, rate limiting, automatic API documentation with Swagger, and comprehensive unit tests.

social_network.title: Creative Social Network
social_network.description: Social platform for creators with content sharing, messaging and like system.
social_network.longDescription: Modern social network for creators to share content, interact with community, real-time messaging with WebSockets, and recommendation system.

store_it.title: Store It - Cloud Storage
store_it.description: Modern cloud storage application with file sharing and folder management.
store_it.longDescription: Complete cloud storage solution developed with Next.js and TypeScript. Intuitive interface to manage your files, share with other users, and organize your documents securely.

airbnb.title: Airbnb Clone
airbnb.description: Airbnb clone with booking system and accommodation search.
airbnb.longDescription: Accommodation booking application inspired by Airbnb. Advanced search, booking system, listing management and modern user interface with Next.js.

trello.title: Trello Clone
trello.description: Task management application inspired by Trello with drag & drop.
trello.longDescription: Trello clone to create boards, lists and cards. Drag & drop system to organize tasks, collaborative management and intuitive interface.

instagram.title: Instagram Clone
instagram.description: Instagram clone with photo sharing and like system.
instagram.longDescription: Social application inspired by Instagram. Photo sharing, like and comment system, news feed and user profiles with TypeScript and React.

memories.title: Memories App
memories.description: Memory sharing application with storage and photo gallery.
memories.longDescription: Application to save and share memories. Photo gallery, descriptions, tags and chronological organization of important moments.

portfolio.title: My Portfolio
portfolio.description: Modern personal portfolio with elegant design and smooth animations.
portfolio.longDescription: Developer portfolio with modern interface, Framer Motion animations, and responsive design. Presentation of projects, skills and professional experiences.

travel.title: Travel UI/UX
travel.description: Modern travel interface with attractive design and optimal user experience.
travel.longDescription: Landing page for a travel application. Modern and clean design, subtle animations, destination presentation and responsive interface developed with Next.js.

angular.title: Angular Practices
angular.description: Angular learning projects with various features and components.
angular.longDescription: Repository of Angular projects and practical exercises. Exploring framework features, reusable components and development best practices.

boucherie.title: Boucherie La Belle Rouge
boucherie.description: E-commerce site for butcher shop with online sales and order system.
boucherie.longDescription: Wordpress/WooCommerce e-commerce site for traditional butcher shop. Product catalog, online ordering system, inventory management, and intuitive customer interface.

iksiir.title: Iksiir
iksiir.description: Online store for natural products: black seed oil, prickly pear seed oil, incense and natural care products.
iksiir.longDescription: Wordpress e-commerce specialized in natural products and essential oils. Black seed oil, prickly pear seed oil, incense and natural care products. Elegant design, secure payment and fast delivery.

mazanutri.title: Mazanutri Beauty
mazanutri.description: Beauty e-commerce site with cosmetic products and booking system.
mazanutri.longDescription: Wordpress site for beauty institute and cosmetic product sales. Product catalog, ordering system, booking integration, and beauty blog.

habachiya.title: Habachiya
habachiya.description: Wholesale site specialized in Ethiopian black seed oil and derivatives since 2019.
habachiya.longDescription: Modification and customization of a Wordpress page for Habachiya, privileged wholesale partner for Ethiopian black seed oil and its derivatives. Design improvement, B2B interface optimization and enhancement of Ethiopian natural products.

ecoviande.title: Ecoviande
ecoviande.description: Exceptional meats for memorable dishes. Artisanal butcher shop specializing in quality meats.
ecoviande.longDescription: Wordpress showcase website for Ecoviande, artisanal butcher shop offering exceptional meats. Highlighting quality, tradition and experience. Elegant and professional design to showcase artisanal expertise.

experience.title: My
experience.subtitle: Companies I've had the pleasure of working with

freelance_2024.description: Designed and developed a web-based e-commerce application in close collaboration with the client. Analyzed needs, sales process, supplier selection, and site design.
achievements: In-depth analysis of client needs and target audience
Development of a tailored e-commerce solution
Delivery and implementation of a solution meeting project requirements

freelance_2023.description: As a full-stack developer, I designed and deployed a website tailored to specific client project requirements with robust architecture.
achievements: Collection of functional and technical requirements through collaborative workshops
Integration of an intuitive front-end and optimized back-end management
Delivery of a turnkey solution aligned with client challenges

woby.description: Development of challenging features in an AWS environment. Optimization of displaying 10,000 collaborator images with caching and reporting system.
achievements: Optimization of storage and loading of 1M images via S3, Lambda and API Gateway
Implementation of resizing algorithm and browser cache mechanism
Development of Reporting system with automated Excel export via AWS Lambda

orange.description: Optimization of internal data analysis process. Automation of data collection and visualization via Google Cloud Platform.
achievements: Design of GCP-based solution (Cloud Functions, Cloud Scheduler)
Development of algorithm to retrieve and format data via Firebase API
Configuration of Google Data Studio for automated graphical visualization

inria.description: Web development with focus on user experience and modern interface.
achievements: Development of user interfaces with React.js
Integration of Material-UI for consistent design
Use of REST API with Swagger and PostgreSQL
